definition: performance of moral or religious acts
details:
noun
- performance of moral or religious acts
= synonyms: deeds
- buildings for carrying on industrial labor
= synonyms: plant
- the internal mechanism of a device
= synonyms: workings
- everything available
= synonyms: whole shebang, whole kit and caboodle, kit and caboodle, whole kit and boodle, kit and kaboodle, kit and boodle, whole kit, whole caboodle, whole works, full treatment
